none.description:
{Divine Spirit}

Proficiency: None.

A hero casts mass Mirth and Sorrow spells at the begining of each battle. Allows mixing of creaturs of neutral and good factions without penalty to morale.

Drains 20 mana per battle and reduces the max movement points by -100.

The effects last until next week.
